title: LeaverBuster and OCE punishable system
body:
Hi,
You guys can easily find that OCE server's punishable system is not working except for the automatically leaver(system detection). Anytime you report someone, no one care because they never get punishment. I doubt that OCE RIOT stuff never review our reports from the system. I am so disappointed. For the LeaverBuster, it is even worse. e.g. In a match, one of my teammates troll the game on purpose and made others don't want to play the game. So I just stay in base wait for the end. However, I was put into the low priority queue due to this. This is just ridiculous.

What do you guys think about this?

replies.body: If Riot does not remove my pop up for the leavebuster, I will leave the game for good. It made me really upset because I have been a good gamer but I had some internet issues so I had some dcs. This is not my fault so I can't make a commitment that I won't do it again.

>So I just stay in base wait for the end.

Oh no, someone's purposefully left the game to torment our team-mates and make an unbalanced game. You know what I'm gonna do about it? I'll afk too! That'll show 'em.
